scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && npm test && npm run build:core && npm run build:dom && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: rm -rf docs && jsdoc ./README.md src -r -t node_modules/latodoc -d docs && cp -R demo ./docs && cp -R dist ./docs/demo
scripts.build:core: browserify ./src/oculusx.js --outfile dist/index.js -s oculusx && uglifyjs dist/index.js -o dist/index.js --source-map url
scripts.build:dom: browserify ./src/dom/bindToElement.js --outfile dist/bind-to-element.js && uglifyjs dist/bind-to-element.js -o dist/bind-to-element.js --source-map url
